Unexpected Bodies with Zhi Xu at Artaud Performance Centre (2020)

Unexpected Bodies is multimedia dance work created by artist Zhi Xu

Choreography, Performance & Programming: Zhi Xu Music: Kat Macdonald Camera: Johannes Birringer, Eve Gabarre, Graeme Shaw Technical Advisor: Graeme Shaw Technicians: Bill Forbes, Phil Maguire, Daniel O’Riordan; Photography: Yifan Li

Premiere: December 9, 2020, Artaud Performance Centre, London.
